CatDescriptText: Dr. M. Bernfeld, Jenkins Arcade, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 22, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that the visit of the Russian ruler, Khrushchev, will promote world peace?" answer reads: "Possibly it may help. From past experiences, however, there is doubt.  I'm of no definite opinion, but it won't hurt."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Dr. M. Bernfeld wearing small moustache and abstract patterned necktie with clip, standing under Jenkins Arcade marquee, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
